title: I'm sorry but I just have to say this...

replies.body: Irelia's not even OP. The only time I worry about Irelia is when anyone else but me is in top lane.
Ik I was just making a joke on it.
That was so funny, I almost forgot how many other people have not only done it, but done it better.
Have you ever asked yourself if any champion really, actually, seriously deserves nerf??? O.O
